name: TEKKEN 7
description: Discover the epic conclusion of the long-time clan warfare between members of the Mishima family. Powered by Unreal Engine 4, the legendary fighting game franchise fights back with stunning story-driven cinematic battles and intense duels that can be enjoyed with friends and rivals.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7/8/10 (64-bit OS required) Processor: Intel Core i3-4160 @ 3.60GHz or equivalent Memory: 6 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660 2GB, GTX 750Ti 2GB, or equivalent DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 60 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX compatible soundcard or onboard chipset
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7/8/10 (64-bit OS required) Processor: Intel Core i5-4690 3.5 GHz or equivalent Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 equivalent or higher  DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 60 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX compatible soundcard or onboard chipset
